official_title: To prohibit the operation of nuclear power plants unless there exists a State and county certified radiological emergency response plan.

summary.text: Nuclear Accountability Act - Prohibits operation of any nuclear utilization facility unless the Nuclear Regulatory Commission finds that the State in which the facility is located, as well as each affected county or county equivalent located within a ten-mile radius, has certified within the last year a radiological emergency response plan which provides reasonable assurance that public health and safety are not endangered by the operation of the facility.
